Translations.Text: He Said: "Did I not say to you, that you will never/not be able (to have) patience with me
He said: "If I asked/questioned you , about a thing after it, so do not accompany/befriend me, you had reached an excuse from at me

So they (B) left/set out until when they (B) came (to) a village/urban city, they asked its people to be fed, so they refused/hated that they have them (B) as guests/help them , so they (B) found in it a wall wanting that to fall down/be wrecked, so he raised it, he (Moses) said: "If you wanted/willed you would have taken/received on (for) it a wage/fee
He said: "This (is) separation between me and between you, I will inform you with (an) explanation/interpretation on (of) what you were not able (to have) patience on it

As for the ship/boat, so it was to (owned by) poorest of poor/poor oppressed working in the sea/ocean/river , so I wanted that I defect it , and behind them was a king he takes/receives every ship/boat forcefully/unjustly/violently
And as for the boy/servant , so his parents were believing, so We feared that he burdens/oppresses them (with) tyranny/arrogance and disbelief
So We wanted/intended that their (B)`s Lord exchanges/substitutes (for) them (B) better than him and purification/correction and nearer/closer (in) mercy/relation

And as for the wall, so it was (belonging) to two boys , two orphans in the city/town, and under it was a treasure/buried treasure for them (B), and their (B)`s father was correct/righteous, so your Lord wanted/willed that they (B) reach their (B)`s maturity/strength, and they (B) bring out their (B)`s treasure/buried treasure, mercy from your Lord, and I did not make/do it from my matter/affair, that (is) explanation/interpretation (of) what you were not able (to have) patience on it
And they ask/question you about (owner) of the two horns/powers/glories , Say: "I will read/recite on (to) you from him a reminder/remembrance
We have highly positioned/strengthened for him in the earth/Planet Earth, and We gave/brought him from every thing a reason/motive/connection
So he followed a reason/motive/connection

Until when he reached the sun`s sunset/west , he found it departing/declining (setting) in (at a) water well/spring mixed with black (foul) mud, and he found at it a nation, We said: "You (owner) of the two horns/powers/glories, either that you torture, and either you take in them a goodness/beauty
He said: "As for who caused injustice/oppression, so we will/shall torture him, then he be returned to his Lord, so He tortures him an awful/obscene/severe torture
And as for who believed and made/did correct/righteous deeds, so to him the best`s/goodnesses` reward/reimbursement , and we will say to him from our order/matter ease/flexibility
Then he followed a reason/motive/connection
Until when he reached the sun`s place and time of appearance/ascent , he found it appears/ascends/rises on a nation We did not make/put from other than it a cover/protection/shelter
Like that, and We had comprehended/enveloped with what (is) at/near him (with) knowledge
Then he followed a reason/motive/connection
Until when he reached between the two barriers/obstacles/mountains , he found from other than them (B) a nation they are not about to/almost understand a saying/opinion and belief

They said: "You (owner) of the two horns/powers/glories, that Yagog and Magog (are) corrupting in the earth/Planet Earth, so do we make/put for you (a) royalty/retainer/expense/tribute on that you put/create between us and between them a barrier/obstacle
He said: "What my Lord highly positioned/strengthened/empowered me in it (is) best , so help/support me with power/strength , I make/create/put between you and between them a blockage/barrier

Give/bring me the huge pieces of iron. Until when he straightened/leveled/equalized between the two sides/directions/mountain sides , he said: "Blow." Until when he made it a fire, he said: "Give/bring me, I pour on it molten copper/brass/iron
So they did not rise/diffuse/spread over (it, nor) that they mount/ascend it , and they were not able (of) piercing/penetration for it
He said: "That (is) mercy from my Lord, so if my Lord`s promise came, he made it flattened/leveled off and my Lord`s promise was truthfully (truthful)
And We left some/part of them (on) that day (to) trouble/agitate (interlock) in some/part, and the horn/bugle/instrument was blown in, so We gathered/collected them all together
And We displayed/presented Hell (on) that day to the disbelievers a display/exhibition
Those who their eyes/sights were in a cover/concealment from My remembrance/reminder, and they were not being able (of) hearing/listening
Did those who disbelieved think/suppose that they take My worshippers/slaves (as) guardians/allies from other than Me? We have prepared/made ready for the disbelievers Hell (as) a place of descent
Say: "Do We inform you with the most losers (in their) deeds
Those whom their endeavors/striving (was) wasted/lost in the life the present/worldly life and they, they206think/suppose that they, they do good work/performance

Those are those who disbelieved with their Lord`s verses/evidences and meeting Him, so their deeds failed/wasted, so We do not take care of (evaluate) for them a weight/measure (on) the Resurrection Day
That (is) their reward/reimbursement , Hell because (of) what they disbelieved, and they took My verses/evidences and My messengers mockingly/making fun
That (E) those who believed and made/did the correct/righteous deeds, (the) treed garden/Paradise (of) the treed garden/Paradise/Elferdowse (one of the Paradises) was for them (as) a place of descent
Immortally/eternally in it, they do not wish/desire (away) from it (a) change/removal/movement

Say: "If the sea/ocean was ink/writing liquid for my Lord`s words/expressions, the sea/ocean would have been depleted/exhausted (E) before that my Lord`s words/expressions deplete/exhaust , and even if We came with equal/alike to it (to the sea/ocean) (for) ink/writing liquid (as) an extension/spread

Say: "Truly I am (a) human equal/alike to you, (it) is being inspired/transmitted to me that your God (is) one God, so who was hoping/expecting his Lord`s meeting, so he makes/does (E) correct/righteous deeds deed , and he does not share/make partners with worshipping his Lord anyone
K H Y EN S/C
Your Lord`s mercy mention (on) His worshipper/slave Zachary/Zacharias
When he called/cried (to) his Lord a hidden/secret call/cry
He said: "My Lord that I, the bones weakened/enfeebled from me, and the hair turned white or gray and my Lord I was not miserable/unhappy with calling you
And that I, I feared the followers/dependents from behind/beyond me, and my woman (wife) was infertile to grant/present for me from at you a follower/friend
(He) inherits me and (he) inherits from Jacob`s family, and my Lord make him accepted/approved/satisfied
You Zacharias/Zachary , that We, We announce good news to you with a boy , his name (is) John/Yahya , We did not make for him from before (an) equivalent/equivalent in height/position
He said: "My Lord that how (could there) be for me a boy and my woman (wife) was infertile and I had reached from the old age exceeding the limit
He said: "Like that." Your Lord said: "It is on Me easy/light , and I had created you from before, and you were not a thing
He said: "My Lord, make/put for me a sign/evidence." He said: "Your sign/evidence (is) that you do not converse/talk (to) the people three nights straight

So he emerged on (to) his nation, from the center of the assembly/the prayers` niche , so he inspired/transmitted/signaled to them that praise/glorify (at) daybreaks/early mornings and evenings/first darkness/dinnertime
You John/Yahya, take The Book with power/strength, and We gave/brought him the judgment/rule (as) a boy/child/infant
And compassion/kindness from at Us, and purification/correction and he was fearing and obeying
And righteous/obedient with his parents, and he was not a disobedient tyrant/rebel
And security/peace on him (on the) day he was born and (the) day he dies, and (the) day he be sent/resurrected/revived alive
And remember/mention in The Book Mary when she distantly isolated herself from her family/relation (to) an easterly/eastern place/position
So she took from other than them a divider/protection , so We sent to her Our Soul/Spirit , so he simulated/represented to her (as an) upright/average human
She said: "That I, I seek protection by the merciful from you, if you were fearing and obeying
He said: "Truly I am your Lord`s messenger to grant/present for you a pure/righteous boy
She said: "How/from where (there) be for me a boy and (a) human has not touched me, and I was not afornicatress/adulteress/prostitute
He said: "`Like that,` said your Lord, it is on Me easy/light , and to make/put him (as) a sign/evidence to the people, and mercy from Us, and (it was) a matter/command accomplished/ executed
So she was pregnant (with) him so she distantly isolated herself with him (to) a far/remote place/position
So the labour/childbirth came to her to (at) the palm tree`s trunk/stem, she said: "Oh I wish I would have died before this and I was forgotten (and long) forgotten
So he (Jesus) called her from below/beneath her: "That do not be sad/grieving, your Lord had put below/beneath you a stream/clearance of a burden/generosity
And shake/move to(wards) you with the palm tree`s trunk/stem, it causes freshly harvested/gathered ripe/moist (dates) to fall/drop repeatedly on you

So eat and drink and be delighted/satisfied eye(s) (delight your eyes), so when you see anyone from the human, so say: `That I made a duty/vow (on myself) to the merciful, a fast , so I will not converse/speak the day/today (to) a human
So she came with him (to) her nation carrying him , they said: "You Mary, you had come (with) a strange and confusing thing
You Aaron`s sister, your father was not (a) human/man of bad/evil , and your mother was not an fornicatress/adulteress/prostitute
So she pointed/indicated to him, they said: "How (do) we converse/speak (to) whom was in the crib/cradle a boy/child/infant
He said: "That I am God`s worshipper/slave, He gave/brought me The Book and He made me a prophet
And He made me blessed, wherever I was/am, and He directed/commanded me with the prayers and the charity/purification as long as I continued/lasted alive
And charitable/obedient with my mother, and He did not make me a miserable/unhappy tyrant/rebel
And the security/peace (was) on me (on the) day I was born, and (the) day I die, and (the) day I be sent/resurrected/revived alive
That (was) Jesus Mary`s son, the correct/real saying/opinion and belief which they (are) doubting/arguing in it
(It) was not to God that (He) take from a child/children (son), His praise/glory, if He ordered/executed amatter/command , so but He says to it: "Be, so it becomes
And that God (is) my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him, that (is) a straight/direct road/way
So the groups/parties differed/disagreed/disputed from between them, so grief/distress to those who disbelieved from an assembly of a great day
Make (to) hear/listen with them, and make to see/understand , a day they come to Us, but the unjust/oppressive today (are) in evident misguidance
And warn/give them notice (of) the Grief`s Day/Resurrection Day, when the matter/affair was accomplished/carried out , and they are in negligence/disregard, and they are not believing
That We, We inhabit the earth/Planet Earth, and who (is) on it, and to Us they return
And remember/mention in The Book Abraham, that he truly was an always very truthful prophet
When he said to his father: "You my father, for what (do) you worship what does not hear/listen, and nor see/understand , and nor enrich/suffice from you a thing
You my father, that I, (it) had come to me from the knowledge, what did not come to you, so follow me, I guide you a straight/level road/way
You my father, do not worship the devil, that the devil was/is to the merciful disobedient
You my father, that I fear that torture touches you from the merciful, so you be to the devil an ally/follower
He said: "Are you shunning/turning away from my gods, you Abraham? If (E) you do not end/terminate/stop, I will stone you, and leave/distance me a long/life time
He said: "Security/peace on you, I will ask for forgiveness for you (from) my Lord, that He truly (was) with me generous/blessing
And I separate/isolate myself from you and what you call from other than God, and I call my Lord, maybe/perhaps that I not be with my Lord`s call/prayer miserable/unhappy
So when he separated/isolated himself from them, and what they call from other than God, We granted for him Issac , and Jacob and each/all, We made a prophet
And We granted for them from Our mercy, and We made for them (a) truthful high and mighty/dignified tongue/language/speech
And remember/mention in The Book Moses, that he truly was faithful/loyal/devoted and (he) was a messenger, a prophet
And We called him from the mountain`s side/direction, the right (side), and We neared/approached him secretly conversing
And We granted for him from Our mercy his brother Aaron, a prophet
And remember/mention in The Book Ishmael , that he truly was truthful (in) the promise, and was a messenger, a prophet
And (he) was ordering/commanding his family/people with the prayers and the charity/purification, and (he) was at his Lord accepted/approved
And remember/mention in The Book Idris, that he truly was always very truthful, and a prophet
And We raised him a high and mighty/dignified place/position

Those are those who God blessed/praised on them from the prophets from Adam`s descendants; and from who We carried with Noah, , and from Abraham`s and Ishmael`s descendants, and from who We guided and We chose/purified, if the merciful`s verses/evidences are read/recited on them they fell down prostrating and weeping
So succeeded/followed from after them a succession , they lost/wasted/destroyed the prayers, and they212followed the lusts/desires/cravings, so they will/shall meet/find misguidance/failure
Except who repented and believed and made/did correct/righteous deeds, so those, they enter the Paradise, and they are not being caused injustice to/oppressed a thing
Treed gardens/paradises (as) eternal residence which the merciful promises His worshippers/slaves with the unseen/hidden , that He truly, His promise was/is coming (E)

They do not hear/listen in it nonsense/senseless talk , except (a) greeting/safety/peace and for them, (is) their provision in it (at) daybreaks/early mornings and (at) evening/first darkness/dinnertime
That (is) the paradise which We make inherit (to) who was fearing and obeying from Our worshippers/slaves
And We do not descend except with your Lord`s order/command, for Him what (is) between Our hands, and what (is) behind Us, and what (is) between that, and your Lord was not frequently forgetting
The skies`/space`s and the earth`s/Planet Earth`s and what (is) between them (B)`s Lord, so worship Him, and endure patience to His worshipping, do you know (an) equivalent to Him
And the human/mankind says: "Is (it that) if I died, I will/shall (E) be brought out alive! ."(expression of wonderment)
Or does not the human remember that We created him from before and (he) was not a thing
So by your Lord We will gather them (E), and the devils, then We will present/bring them (E) around Hell kneeling/standing on (their) toes
Then We will remove (E) from every group/party which of them (is) stronger arrogant/disobedience on (to) the merciful
Then We are (E) more knowledgeable with (about) those who, they are more worthy/deserving roasting/suffering/burning with (in) it (Hell)
And that from you (there is not) except (who is) nearing/approaching it , (that) was on (by) your Lord decidedly/positively ordered/executed
Then We save/rescue those who feared and obeyed, and We leave (disregard) the unjust/oppressors in it kneeling/standing on (their) toes

And when Our evidences/verses evidences are read/recited on (to) them, those who disbelieved said to those who believed: "Which (of) the two groups/parties/flocks is (in) better residence and best gathering/assembly/club
And how many We destroyed from before them from people of one era/generation/century? They are better home effects/money and appearance/pleasant appearance

Say: "Who was in the misguidance, so the merciful will extend/spread (E) for him extension/spreading until when they saw/understood what they are being promised, either the torture, and either the Hour/Resurrection , so they will know who he is worst (in) a place/position, and weaker soldiers/warriors
And God increases those who were guided (in) guidance, and the remainders the correct/righteous deeds (are) better at your Lord a replacement/compensation and better (in) a return
So did you see/understand who disbelieved with Our evidences/verses, and said: "I will be given213property/possession/wealth and children
Has he seen/been informed (of) the unseen/absent , or he took/received at the merciful a promise/contract
No but, We will write/dictate what he says, and We extend/spread to him from the torture extension/spreading
And We make him inherit what he says, and he comes to Us singly/alone
And they took/received from other than God gods, to be for them glory/might/honour
No but they will disbelieve with their worshipping, and they (are) on them adversaries/opponents
Do you not see/understand that We sent the devils on (to) the disbelievers, they penetrate their minds/influence them penetration of their minds/influence
So do not hurry/hasten/rush on them, but We count for them counting
A day We gather the fearing and obeying to the merciful (as) a delegation of dignitaries
And We drive (herd) the criminals/sinners to Hell successively in groups
They do not own/possess the mediation, except who took/received at the merciful a promise/contract
And they said: "The merciful took/received a child (son)
You had come (with) a blasphemous/disastrous thing

The skies/space are about to/almost split/crack/cleave from it, and the earth/Planet Earth splits/cracks open ,and the mountains fall down (in) demolition and breaking down into pieces violently with noise
That (E) they called to the merciful a child (son)
And (it) would not (be) to the merciful that He takes a child (son)
That every/each whom (is) in the skies/space and the earth/Planet Earth except is coming (E) (to) the merciful (as) a worshipper/slave
He had counted/completed them and He counted them counting
And all of them are coming to Him (in) the Resurrection Day singly/alone/one
That those who believed and made/did the correct/righteous deeds, the merciful will make/create for them love/affection
So but We eased it with your tongue/language, to announce good news with it (to) the fearing and obeying, and warn/give notice with it (to) a nation (in) harsh/violent dispute
And how many before them We destroyed from people of one era/generation/century, do you sense/feel from them from anyone, or hear for them (a) low voice/whisper/faint sound
T H
We did not descend the Koran on you to (to) be miserable/unhappy
Except (as) a reminder to who fears
Descent from who created the earth/Planet Earth and the skies/space, the high/elevated
The merciful on the throne He aimed to/sat on/straightened
For Him what (is) in the skies/space, and what (is) in the earth/Planet Earth, and what (is) between them (B), and what (is) below/beneath the moist dust/earth
And if you publicize/declare with the saying/word/opinion and belief , so that He truly knows the secret and (what is) more hidden
God, no god except Him, for Him (are) the names the best/most beautiful
And did Moses`, information/speech come to you
When he saw a fire, so he said to his family: "Wait/remain/stay, that I , I perceived/saw a fire, maybe/perhaps I come to you from it with a fire`s flame/torch, or I find on (at) the fire guidance
So when he came to it, (it) was called: "You Moses
That I, I am your Lord, so take off your two shoes , that you are at the Valley the Holy/Hallowed/Sanctified/Blessed Tuwan/wrapped within (itself)
And I, I chose you, so hear/listen to what is inspired/transmitted
That I , I am God, no god except Me, so worship Me, and keep up/start the prayers for mentioning/remembering Me (E)
That (E) the Hour/Resurrection is coming, I am about to/almost, I hide it, (so) each self (is) to be rewarded/reimbursed because (of) what it strives/endeavors
So who does not believe with it and he followed his self attraction for desire does not object/prevent/obstruct you from it, so you fall/be destroyed
And what (is) that at your right (hand) you, Moses
He said: "It is my stick/cane, I lean on/support myself on it, and I hit/move/shake with it on my sheep and goats, and for me in it others needs/purposes
He said: "Throw it away, you Moses
So he threw it away, so then it is (a) quick moving snake/alive
He said: "Take it and do not fear, We will return it (to) its form , the first/beginning
And gather/join (fold) your hand to your wing/side, it appears/emerges white with no evil/harm , another evidence/sign
To show you/make you understand (E) from Our evidences/signs the greatest/biggest
Go to Pharaoh, that he truly tyrannized
He said: "My Lord expand/delight for me, my chest (innermost)
And ease/make flexible for me my matter/affair
And untie/undo (the) difficulty/knot from my tongue/speech
They understand/know my speech
And make/put for me a minister/supporter from my family/relation
Aaron, my brother
Strengthen/support with him my power
And share him/make him a partner in my matter/affair
So that/in order that we praise/glorify you much
And we mention/remember you much
That you were/are with us seeing/knowing
He said: "You had been given your request/question, you Moses
And We had blessed on you another time
When We inspired/transmitted to your mother what is being inspired/transmitted

That throw/hurl him in the box/chest so throw/hurl him in the body of water (sea/river/lake), so the body of water (sea/river/lake) will throw him by the shore/(river) bank/coast. An enemy for Me, and an enemy for him takes/receives him; and I threw on you love/affection from Me, and to be made on My sight/watchfulness/protection

And when your sister walks, so she says: Do I guide/lead you on (to) who maintains him ?" So We returned you to your mother, in order that her eye/sight delight/satisfy , and nor she be saddened/grieved, and you killed a self so We saved/rescued you from the grief/sadness/depression, and We tested you , testfully , so you stayed/remained years in Madya`s people , then you came on a predestiny you Moses
And I made you for My self
Go, you and your brother with My evidences/signs/verses, and do not weaken/relax in mentioning/remembering Me
You (B) go to Pharaoh, that he truly, he tyrannized
So you (B) say to him a lenient/flexible saying/opinion and belief, maybe/perhaps he mentions/remembers, or fears
They (B) said: "Our Lord, that we truly fear that he hastens/abuses on us or that he tyrannizes
He said: "Do not fear (B), that I am (E) with you (B), I hear/listen, and I see/understand

So you (B) come to him, so you (B) say: We (E) are your Lord`s two messengers, so send with us Israel`s sons and daughters, and do not torture them, We had come to you with a sign/evidence from your Lord, and the greeting/safety/security on who followed the guidance
We (E) had been inspired/transmitted to us that the torture (is) on who lied/denied/falsified and turned away
He said: "So who (is) your (B)`s Lord, you Moses
He said: "Our Lord (is) who gave/granted every thing its creation then He guided
He said: "So what (about the) affair/condition (of) the first/beginning generations/centuries
He said: "Its knowledge (is) at my Lord in a Book , my Lord does not misguide and nor forgets

Who made/put for you the earth/Planet Earth spread , and He threaded/passed for you in it roads/means , and He descended from the sky water, so We brought out with it pairs/spouses from different/various plants
Eat and graze/pasture your camels/livestock, that truly in that (are) evidences/signs (E) to (owners) of the minds/reasoning/powers
From it We created you, in it We return/repeat you, and from it We bring you out another once/again
And We had shown him/made him understand from Our verses/evidences/signs all of it, so he denied/falsified and refused/hated
He said: "Did you come to us to bring us out from our land/Earth with your magic/sorcery, you Moses
So we will come to you, with magic/sorcery equal/alike to it, so make/put between us and between you an appointment we do not break it, we and nor you, a place/position equally distanced/just
He said: "Your appointment (is) day (of) the decoration/beauty/ornament, and that the people be gathered at sunrise/daybreak
So Pharaoh turned away, so he gathered/collected his plot/deceit then he came

Moses said to them: "Your calamity/scandal/grief , do not fabricate/cut and split on (about) God lies/falsifications , so He destroys/uproots you with a torture, and who fabricated/cut and split had failed/despaired
So they disputed/quarreled their matter/affair between them, and they kept the secret conversation secret

They said: "That those two (are) two magicians/sorcerers (E), they (B) want/intend that they (B) bring you out from your land/Earth with their (B)`s magic/sorcery, and they (B) go/eliminate with your way/religious approach/habit the best example
So gather/collect your plot/deceit then come/bring (it in) a row/line , and had succeeded/won today who (is) defeated/overcame, and became dignified
They said: "You Moses either that you throw , or that we be first who threw
He said: "Rather you throw ." So then their ropes/ties and their sticks/canes is imagined/believed to him from their magic/sorcery that it hastens/moves quickly
So he felt inner horror/fear in himself hiddenly/secretly Moses
We said: "Do not fear, that you, you are the highest/mightiest

And throw/throw away what (is) in your right (hand), it snatches/swallows quickly what they made/performed , truly they made/performed a magician`s/sorcerer`s plot/deceit/manipulation , and the magician/sorcerer does not succeed/win where/when he came/destroyed
So the magicians/sorcerers were thrown/thrown away prostrating, they said: "We believed with (in) Aaron`s and Moses` Lord

He said: "You believed to him before that I permit for you, that he truly (is) your biggest/greatest (E) who taught/instructed you the magic/sorcery, so I will cut off/sever (E) your hands and your feet from opposites (sides), and I will crucify you (E) in the palm trees` trunks/stems, and you will know (E) which of us (is) stronger (in) torture and more lasting

They said: "We will never/not prefer/choose you over what came to us from the evidences, and who created/brought us into being , so order/execute what you are ordering/executing but you (only) destroy/end this the life the present/worldly life
We (E) believed with our Lord, to forgive for us our sins/mistakes and what you compelled/forced us on it from the magic/sorcery, and God (is) best and more remaining (everlasting)
That truly he, who comes (to) his Lord a criminal/sinner, so that to him (is) Hell he does not die in it and nor lives
And who comes to Him believing, he had made/did the correct/righteous deeds, so those, for them the stages/degrees the high/elevated
Treed gardens (as) eternal residence, the rivers/waterways flow/pass from beneath/below it, immortally/eternally in it, and that (is) who purified`s/corrected`s reward/reimbursement
And We had inspired/transmitted to Moses that walk/move with My worshippers/slaves so strike/move adry a path/way in the sea/ocean , do not fear over taking/pursuit , and nor you (should) fear
So Pharaoh followed them with his soldiers/warriors, so from the body of water covered/afflicted them what covered/afflicted them (so they drowned in the water)
And Pharaoh misguided his nation, and he did not guide
You Israel`s sons and daughters, We had saved/rescued you from your enemy and We promised you the mountain`s right side/direction, and We descended on you the manna/sap , and the quail/amusement
Eat from tasty/goodnesses what We provided for you, and do not tyrannize/exceed the limit in it, so My anger takes place/descends on you, and whom My anger descends on him, so he had fallen/dropped
